participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Laid-back and easygoing, enjoys casual conversations and has a good sense of humor.
participant_1.background: Grew up in a diverse urban setting and has a deep appreciation for different cultures and lifestyles.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Energetic and optimistic, loves to engage in new experiences and meet new people.
participant_2.background: Raised in a suburban environment, Alex has a background in community service and values meaningful connections.
